com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr.impl

Class PoolableSessionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.pool.BaseKeyedPoolableObjectFactory<String,javax.jcr.Session>
      • com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr.impl.PoolableSessionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.pool.KeyedPoolableObjectFactory<String,javax.jcr.Session>

    public final class PoolableSessionFactory
extends org.apache.commons.pool.BaseKeyedPoolableObjectFactory<String,javax.jcr.Session>
    A factory that creates poolable sessions used to connect to the Java Content Repository.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PoolableSessionFactory(javax.jcr.Repository repo, CredentialsProvider creds)
      Initialise the poolable object factory setting the repository and credentials providers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyObject(String key, javax.jcr.Session obj)
      Destroy the pooled session by logging out from the Java Content Repository.
      javax.jcr.Session makeObject(String key)
      Create a new session object by logging in to the Java Content Repository anonymously.
      boolean validateObject(String key, javax.jcr.Session obj)
      Validate a session by checking that it is still live.

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.commons.pool.BaseKeyedPoolableObjectFactory

        activateObject, passivateObject

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
